message.translation: The Girl Who Lost Her Memories

message.original: 海岸で見つけた少女の様子を見に行く
message.translation: Go and visit the girl you found washed up on the beach

message.original: 白竜神殿メイリーフの家へ向かう
message.translation: Go to Mayleaf's home in the White Dragon Temple

message.original: セシリーを見つけたローテスの村へ向かう
message.translation: Go to the village of Rotes, where Cecily was found

message.original: ズールを探し海岸へ向かう
ローテスの村のエリオットの元へ戻る
message.translation: Return to Elliot in the village of Rotes
